rows.label: tlk502109_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey... Do you know who tends this
garden?

rows.label: tlk502109_msg0003
rows.name:
But this place is the cathedral of the
Acedian Pope.

rows.label: tlk502109_msg0004
rows.name:
I guess it would have the same stately
aura, no matter who tended it.

rows.label: tlk502109_msg0005
rows.name:
Well, I can really feel that the gardener
here truly cherishes this place. I think
they must be a good person.

rows.label: tlk502109_msg0008
rows.name:
If I met the person responsible, I'd
certainly want to commend them on
their excellent work.

rows.label: tlk502109_msg0011
rows.name: Of course! I'd be glad to.

rows.label: tlk502109_msg0014
rows.name: Well, Hotaru... I'd like to give you this.

rows.label: tlk502109_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm sure that the person who tends this
garden would thank you for your kind
words and give you a token of thanks.

rows.label: tlk502109_msg0016
rows.name:
Actually, I'm rather pleased that
someone else appreciates this garden.
